Text: Resume for Tariq KhanLyndon Taylor suggested that I send you my resume attached I appreciate your consideration of it I am very interested in a position at Enron I am working mainly on domestic power projects at Coastal but also work on some international projects I have been a lawyer for ten years and have significant deal experience I also have an MBA and speak five languages Lyndon said that you would mention my name to Kristina Mordaunt I very much appreciate that also I look forward to speaking with you I can be reached at Best regards Tariq Tariq Khan Mark Taylor MS Word doc
